episodes.overview: News of the real reason behind Chloe and Elliott's breakup spreads like wildfire. Diags is in Fran's bad books and it seems he cannot do anything right.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Fran and Diags face an uncertain future, as do Ricky and Jess. Chloe and Elliott struggle to spend time apart. Georgia and Tommy go from strength to strength.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: News of Jess and Ricky's split rocks Essex, Fran and Diags try to move past their problems and everyone gets into the Halloween spirit for Ferne's party.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Ricky realises he needs to apologise for his behaviour, but will Jess want to listen? Chloe and Elliott's ongoing relationship woes come to a head.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The UK's most talked-about reality show returns with a fourteenth series. What will happen during a girly holiday in Tenerife? Can Bobby outdo his revealing outfit from last year?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: What will happen during a girly holiday in Tenerife? Can Bobby outdo his revealing outfit from last year?

episodes.name: The Only Way Is Marbs 2015: Part 1
episodes.overview: The real life soap returns, following the Essex gang to Marbella. Lockie realises he wants to be with Danni, but is it too late? Pete Wicks causes a stir amongst the single ladies.

episodes.name: The Only Way Is Marbs 2015: Part 2
episodes.overview: Lockie hopes Danni will give their relationship another chance. Jake is on his best behaviour as he tries to win back Chloe L. Vas has some home truths for Gemma.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The fallout from the gang's trip to Marbs is evident as Lockie moves out of the flat he shares with Danni and Vas and Gemma's war of words escalates.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Jake struggles to control his jealousy yet again - could someone be testing him? Tommy gets some fatherly advice. Arg and Lydia throw a summer solstice party.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Jake and Chloe's rekindled relationship seems to be heading for trouble. Georgia is furious when Ferne accuses her of being a doormat. Pete loses his cool.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lydia and Arg try to make Jake realise how unreasonable he can be towards Chloe, Gemma kills off 'The GC', and Pete lock horns with Lewis again.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Arg and Lydia's reunion looks set to come crashing down when Arg falls off the wagon. Jake tries to prove his commitment to Chloe. Gemma and Lauren lock horns.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: With Lockie finally moving on, is Danni really ready to let him go? Gemma and Bobby's big fight is still making waves. Vas and Lauren introduce hot new girl Verity.

episodes.name: The Only Way Is Marbs, Part 1
episodes.overview: The real-life soap returns for its 16th series, beginning by following the Towie gang on another Spanish jaunt for a final summer slice of partying, sun, sea and drama in Marbella. Which relationships will still be going strong, who will hook up on this holiday, and what beachwear will Bobby be sporting this time?

episodes.name: The Only Way is Marbs, Part 2
episodes.overview: The gang's Marbella escapades continue and, while Lewis gets body beautiful in Essex, the boys spot a beauty of their own in Spain - Lewis' ex-girlfriend Nicole.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ferne and Chloe Lewis clash again, but Ferne's day brightens when she bumps into Liam. With Nicole now back in town, Lewis takes his chance to catch up with her.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Tensions come to a head between Lewis and Mike, Jake confronts Mike about his recent remarks and Danni extracts a confession out of Nicole.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Arg and Lydia are in turmoil yet again thanks to his lies, Dan and Kate talk over their broken relationship and Lewis continues to make a play for Nicole.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Arg is forced to deal with Lydia's rejection as she goes on a night out in a bid to forget him. Dan enlists Diags and Lockie as he sets about surprising Kate.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As he finally comes face-to-face with Lydia, will Arg's apologies and excuses fall on deaf ears, and could Danni and Lockie's flirting lead to a reunion?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Lydia remains distant with Arg. Jess questions where her relationship is heading with Ferne, while the flirtation between Lockie and Danni continues.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: As the gang prepares to celebrate Halloween, Vas tries to make amends to those he has wronged, and Ferne and Liam's romance starts to turn sour.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After giving the Bonfire night party a miss, could Arg and Lydia finally be back on track? Jess reassesses her feelings for Pete. Nicole and Lewis come to blows.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Kate is caught in the middle as Ferne and Chloe L's feud continues. Lewis drops a bombshell which could put Jess and Pete's budding relationship in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: All eyes are on Jess in the aftermath of Lewis's revelation. Emotions run high when Jess serenades Nanny Pat for her 80th birthday.

episodes.name: The Only Way is Mallorca (1)
episodes.overview: The Essex gang head to Mallorca, where Megan and Pete face more accusations, Arg confronts Lydia and Bobby tries to broaden his cultural horizons.

episodes.name: The Only Way is Mallorca (2)
episodes.overview: The drama in Mallorca continues as Chloe Lewis tries to prove that Megan is not to be trusted. Back in Essex, Diags tries to help Arg and Dan get over their exes.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Pete steps in when the rumours about Megan's behaviour in Mallorca push her to breaking point.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Tempers flare as Mike and Pete trade insults. Megan is upset to hear that Chloe M and Courtney have been socialising with Lydia and co. Bobby tries to move on.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Megan faces a new battle as she and Chloe M acknowledge their friendship woes. Danni holds a fashion show. Gemma returns to help Billie banish an unwanted visitor.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The fallout from Megan and Chloe M's big bust-up causes problems. Arg and Dan settle in to their new pad. Jess Wright and her dog Bella return to cheer Bobby up.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Gemma reveals her secret crush on Jon, but will she still be so keen when Kate accuses Jon of secretly messaging her? The gang take part in a silly sports day.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Jon comes to blows with Kate before clashing with Diags, who is angered by his treatment of Dan. Gemma and Bobby dish out agony aunt advice across the airwaves.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Jon's feud with Kate remains unresolved, and he seems poised to start another with Chloe Sims. Arg talks to Debbie for the first time since his break-up with Lydia.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Last in the 18th series of the real-life soap. Kate reaches breaking point. Pete and Megan's relationship reaches the next level. The gang celebrate Bobby's 30th birthday in style.

episodes.name: The Only Way Is Marbs (1)
episodes.overview: The award-winning real life soap returns for its nineteenth series, and the gals and guys are back in the Spanish resort of Marbella for a final summer slice of sun, sea and drama.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: There is a war of words when Kate tells Lydia about Danni's comments over her night with Arg. What will Megan's dad have to say when he bumps into Pete?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Chloe L is in the thick of things as she faces more accusations from Kate and also comes face to face with Georgia. Pete seeks forgiveness from Megan's parents.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Pete tracks Megan down to make a big declaration, but will it fall on deaf ears? Chloe L builds bridges with Georgia. Chris pours his heart out about Amber.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Pete whisks Megan off to a spa for the night. Gemma is back from her holiday and eager to catch up on the Essex antics.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Megan is left in tears at the Halloween party thanks to Lockie. Chloe L has a one-to-one chat with Kate. Gemma has a hilarious Halloween admission to make.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Lauren Goodger returns to offer Megan McKenna more advice and Love Island couple Nathan Massey and Cara De La Hoyde pop in to Tommy's birthday party with some news.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Pete is soon back in Megan's bad books after she sees the results of his latest modelling shoot. Lockie has words with Danni for stirring up trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After weeks of begging for forgiveness, Pete finds himself in the dog house yet again. A special guest is in attendance as Chloe Sims celebrates her birthday.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: With half the gang in Tenerife, the gossip mill quickly goes into overdrive when Liam starts a rumour concerning Megan's best friend Amber T. Back in Essex, a supportive Megan confronts Liam about his behaviour, leading to further tension as Pete steps up to defend his girlfriend. Elsewhere, Chloe S drops a bombshell when she confesses to a whirlwind romance with Liam, only to reveal that they have now split. Liam is eager to win her back, but is she prepared to give him another chance, especially amid all the current drama? Meanwhile, Gemma's plans for a big birthday bash are halted when she ends up hospitalised in Tenerife.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The fallout from Liam's rumour continues to affect everyone in the group. Pete vents his frustrations about Liam to Lockie, but could there be an underlying reason for Pete losing his cool? The pressure starts to get to Amber T, who breaks down and confesses to ongoing problems with boyfriend Jamie. Meanwhile, Gemma returns to Essex after her spell in hospital with a surprising revelation for Chloe S, Bobby and Georgia.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Lydia is shocked to learn that Gemma slept with Arg just a few hours before she did. Georgia challenges Amber about her behaviour, and convinces her to beg for Megan's forgiveness.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Amber T's dishonesty starts to catch up with her and Megan warns her that her break-up with Jamie is about to get nasty, while several familiar faces return to Essex.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The whole gang escape Essex for the bright lights of London, while the animosity between Chloe M and Amber T boils over into their most explosive argument yet.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Chloe L makes a shocking admission to Kate and Georgia about Dan. Gemma's egg-freezing mission steps up a gear as she goes to see a specialist.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Long-standing tensions come to head as Pete and Megan celebrate their one year anniversary. Things get awkward when Georgia questions Amber T and Yazmin on their comments about her. Charlie King returns to Essex to help Gemma get fit. Dan wonders if Chloe L still has feelings for him following her revelation to Kate.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Reality series. Emotions run high as Megan and Pete face up to their relationship woes. Charlie and Bobby chat about their old friendship. Kate washes her hands of Chloe L and Dan.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Charlie King tries to settle back into Essex. Rumours begin to circulate about the real reason for Megan and Pete's split. Chloe S finally loses patience with Liam.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Emotions run high as Gemma attends the fertility clinic. The girls console Megan over her break-up with Pete. Charlie tries to salvage his friendship with Bobby.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: In Amsterdam, Georgia's feud with Yaz is the big talking point. A nasty rumour begins to circulate about Courtney. Are Chloe S and Pete more than just friends?

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Megan and Pete's split continues to divide the gang. Chloe S accuses Megan of playing the victim. Courtney is devastated as Myles gives her the silent treatment.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Gemma throws an Easter party in a bid to distract herself from her baby woes. Megan and Chloe S finally square up at the party, but will they make amends?

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Can Megan and Pete sort out their differences and move forward as friends? Yaz confronts Lockie with some ground rules. Has Myles forgiven Courtney yet?

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Amber T clashes with Jamie and his new girlfriend. Cara gives her side of the story over her split with Nathan. Amber D has a surprising admission about Chris.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Tommy and Georgia clash with Megan at dinner, leading to an explosive showdown when Pete confronts Tommy. A frustrated Chloe S seeks support from Lockie and Mario as she tries to avoid getting involved in further drama. Chloe M feels let down by Courtney when she refuses to cut ties with Amber T. Chris and Amber D grow closer as they head out on a date. Bobby tries his hand at life modelling.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: There is more bad feeling in Essex as Megan celebrates the opening of her restaurant, with notable no-shows from Chloe S, Chloe M, Courtney, Tommy and Georgia at the big event. Pete successfully supports his ex, and later has some choice words for power couple Tommy and Georgia and even good pal Chloe S. Courtney apologises to Chloe M for her recent lack of support. Gemma seeks professional advice as her quest to find a man continues.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Last in the series of the reality show following a group of buff boys and glamorous girls from Essex. Unresolved tensions between Megan and Chloe M finally come to a head at Danâs birthday bash, leading to a tearful plea from Courtney. Amber T is less than impressed when Lauren Pope appears at Danâs party. Is there a spark between them? Liam and Chloe S finally make amends. Yaz, Georgia and Lydia reflect on the continuing rivalry between the two boy groups.

episodes.name: The Only Way is Marbs (1)
episodes.overview: The reality series returns as the gang head off for their annual trip to Marbella. Chloe S has a strong opinion on Pete and Megan's reconciliation. What is upsetting Courtney?

episodes.name: The Only Way is Marbs (2)
episodes.overview: The gang's jaunt to sunny Spain continues with the arrival of Jon Clark, who sets his sights on Lauren P. Courtney invites Megan and Amber T on a night out.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Megan breaks down as more animosity arises from the girlband reunion. Gemma makes a dramatic announcement. There are tears for Amber T when she seeks out Dan.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Love could be in the air as Lauren and Jon decide to give things a go.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Amber T and Dan's relationship takes another unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Could Lauren and Jon's budding relationship be under threat already? Myles moans to the boys about Chloe M and Chloe L's involvement in Courtney's love life. Amber T and Dan go on a proper date. Bobby embarks on a new career.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The gang head off to London for a change of scenery, but drama soon follows as tensions brew between Gemma and Bobby, Chloe M and Myles and Jon and Jordan.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Myles and Chloe M's war of words leads to a showdown between Myles and Taylor. Gemma tries to build bridges with Bobby. Jon airs his frustrations about Lauren.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After a year away, Arg returns to the fold and finds himself straight back in the heart of the drama as he confronts Gemma over their tryst in Marbella last year. Can they put everything behind them? There are more tears for Chloe S as she and Gemma discuss their fears for the future. Myles, Courtney, Chloe M and Taylor attempt to build bridges.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: As many of the gang head to Dublin for a short getaway, will Arg and Gemma be able to resist another holiday fling? Jon angrily confronts Mario over his involvement in Laurenâs love life. Amber T is left upset by rumours surrounding Danâs recent exploits. Amber D makes a confession about her relationship with Chris.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Jon and Chris take Lauren and Amber D on a tense double date.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: It's the morning after Mario's birthday and Ferne and Charlie have ended up in bed again.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Megan decides it is time to move on after hearing the latest rumours about her love life.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Danni returns to Essex for one night only, sending shockwaves around the group.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: With Georgia remaining uncertain over her future, can Tommy help her see a way forward?

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Lauren is upset to hear that Jon is back with his ex.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Only Way Is EsseXmas 2017 Special

episodes.name: The Only Way is Barcelona
episodes.overview: Essex's finest return and head to Barcelona for sun, fun and plenty of drama! Power couple Lockie and Yaz, spend some quality time with their friends in the sun-soaked city and each admit that all is not well in their relationship. Loveable new boys Dean and Jordan have previous with most of Essex, but whose feathers will they ruffle most in Barcelona? Back in Essex, Gemma and Arg are taking bold strides in their relationship, and Pete bashfully admits to Chloe that he's going on a date

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After an explosive trip to Barcelona, the Essex residents are back with a bang. Yaz escapes to her family home and admits to her problems with Lockie - his sexist and rude behaviour has affected her friendships and left her feeling embarrassed. As one relationship teeters in the balance, another one blossoms as perpetual bachelor, Dan, wants to give things a go with new hottie, Clelia.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: As Pete's new relationship with Shelby goes from strength to strength, his friends are concerned that he's isolating himself from the rest of the group. Chloe Sims also has reservations over his new lady love, whilst Gatsby insinuates that Shelby is flirtatious with other guys. As the chorus of disapproval grows louder, will Pete acknowledge that his relationship is too full-on? Or is Shelby worth protecting at all costs?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Now that Gemma and Arg are finally official it appears that they might not be on the same page after all. Lockie and Yaz both vow to write honest letters to one other to heal their divisions. Dean takes Amber on a second date to a cocktail-making class. Jon pursues drama of the thespian kind

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Chloe Sims delivers some home truths about Arg being too immature for fatherhood. Courtney dumps Myles who tells Lockie he'll do anything to get her back. Shelby lets slip that she might be in love with new beau Pete.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The gang heads to Brighton, where Courtney considers getting back together with Myles, Chloe challenges Jon about his behaviour around women, and Arg and Gemma share more drama.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Yaz's jealousy issues continue to haunt her and Clelia urges Pete to show how committed he is to Shelby before he goes on a week-long adventure holiday.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Bobby and Lockie both call Arg out on his behaviour, Yaz looks ahead to her birthday, and Myles wants to get back together with Courtney, who is enjoying being single again.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Gatsby encourages Dean to clear the air with Chloe Sims after not hearing from her since their date but then Dean discovers Chloe spent the weekend with a younger man! Amber realises why Dan is refusing to commit to her. Trying to help, Yaz suggests a relationship counsellor for Dan and Amber. Arg learns that he needs to face the consequences of his actions, and Jordan faces the wrath of Myles after his efforts to comfort a freshly single Courtney blows up in his face.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: It's the series finale, but the Essex drama shows no signs of packing up for the summer. Arg's behaviour pushes Gemma to breaking point. Jordan's friends give him the cold shoulder when he sticks to his principles. Myles gives Courtney an ultimatum. Dan struggles to commit to Amber while Chloe has doubts about her relationship with Adam. And Tommy is thrown a birthday party fit for a king.

episodes.name: The Only Way is Italia
episodes.overview: The return of a new series. Georgia organises a couplesâ trip and whisks Tommy away to Italy, while in Essex, Courtney is working on her revenge body. But is she ready to move on?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After an eventful time in Sardinia, Myles tries to smooth things over in Essex. Yaz and Lockieâs continued bickering is hasnât escaped the notice of their friends and family. Gemma is on the hunt for new staff for her business.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Battles start to brew between Essexâs biggest power couples as Yaz and Lockie clash with Dan and Amber. What will happen when the couples come face-to-face at Essex-fest?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Tensions are running high after power couples Lockie and Yaz and Dan and Amber had their run in at Essex-Fest. Elsewhere, Yaz also falls out with Courtney and Chloe.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Yaz and Lockie feel their increasing arguments have started to affect how they behave with their friends. Lockie admits that there is trouble in paradise, but how will Yaz react when she finds out that heâs been having these conversations behind her back? Another warring duo that need to settle their beef is Sam and Pete. Will Pete sip his brave juice and issue an apology? At the Essex End of Summer Gala thereâs a surprise arrival whoâs set to turn a lot of heads, but who is this mystery guest?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Diags organises a trip to Newcastle, which Pete hopes will help Lockie to forget his relationship woes. Courtney and Shelby need the trip to take their minds off their exes.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The GC is deliriously happy and is in full nesting mode choosing furniture for the house of her dreams with Arg. Pete and Shelbyâs relationship has turned bitter since their break-up and sheâs been slating him behind his back. Meanwhile, Tommy continues to get the boys of Essex to bare all and tap into their emotional side.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Yaz returns after her time away, and both she and Lockie are on journeys of self-discovery in a bid to help their relationship. Dan is charged with finding Diags the perfect date in order to solve his loneliness. But will Diags get friend zoned? Meanwhile, Chloe is riddled with insecurities and tries to channel her inner diva to tackle her confidence problems.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Diags is set for a date with Jodie but will his fear of rejection mean that he will scare easily or will he finally let his guard down? Tommy and Georgia celebrate their fourth anniversary, while Gatsby tries to make peace with Pete.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Kadyâs efforts at playing Cupid with Diags and childhood friend Jodie donât go to plan. Essexâs most eligible bachelor Sam Mucklow seems to have a quandary on his hands, and Dan and Amber host a supper, but sparks fly over the guest list.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Sam is determined to make a good impression on his first date with Lauren, cracks begin to appear in Dan and Amberâs relationship, and Myles has something to ask Kady.

episodes.name: The Only Way Is Thailand (1)
episodes.overview:
Essexâs finest kick off a brand-new series with a trip to Thailand, whilst back at home a raft of fresh faces are making their mark.

After a turbulent few months, Dan and Amber finally called time on their relationship. Now heâs back on the market, is a holiday romance in Thailand on the cards for Essexâs most eligible bachelor? And how will his love-life fare when the boys try to thwart his pulling attempts by hiding his most treasured possession: his hairdryer?

episodes.name: The Only Way Is Thailand (2)
episodes.overview: Will Chloe come clean about her feelings for that special close friend? And having recovered from a night on the tiles, Sam had an axe to grind...

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After a holiday flirtation with Chloe Sims, Dan finds himself facing the reality of pursuing the Queen of Essex.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Dan spends a weekend in Manchester - but stops off to visit Chloe S on his way out of town. Chloe M is devastated to learn her mother is moving away, but gets a job offer from Sam.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Dan returns to Essex and sets out to clear his name. Harry finally manages to get a date with Chloe R, and Bobby makes an appearance on Loose Women to promote his petition.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: After Amber's shock return, she's yet to confront either Dan or Chloe, but the pair have unfinished business to sort first. Will Dan come clean and tell Chloe every single painful detail about Amber? And what about Amber? Will she finally get her closure with Dan?

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Dan might have put his woman troubles to bed, but he's going to have to put in work if he wants to get things back on track with former best mate Diags. With Dan desperate to repair their friendship, can the pals patch things up ahead of their joint party and rekindle their once powerful bromance?

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview:
With two suitors vying for her affections, Shelbyâs feeling torn.

With the pressure mounting on her, which boy will reign triumphant in the battle for Shelbyâs heart?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Tom and Miss Tribble split when Sam re-enters the scene, causing a big drama among the former love birds. Celia is feeling let down by Shelby.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Sam and Shelby's honeymoon period ends abruptly. Chloe realises life is lonely when no one has your back. Bobby is still looking for a love match. Demi's birthday bash arrives.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Are Yaz and Lockie about to rekindle their flame? Liv and Shelby cross paths for the first time since the explosive night at Bobby's birthday. Gatsby and Diags plan to get fit.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Shelby may have made amends with Liv, but relations with Clelia are still frosty after she voiced some brutal opinions about Shelby's approach to friendship.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Things have been far from friendly between Liv and inseparable duo Courtney and Chloe M for a while now. But on her first night in Marbs, Liv kicked off big time.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Dan has been in doting boyfriend mode for some time, cementing himself firmly in Amber's good books. But how will she react when he heads out on a wild night with the boys?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Dan and Amber have a wobble in Marbella when his partying ways bring her insecurities to the surface.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Harry might have thought he'd ironed out his problems with love interest Frankie, but now it's emerged that there was more to his texts with Ella than he made out.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Diags and Amber put their misunderstanding behind them when they are forced to work together. Chloe Sims still isn't out of the woods when it comes to Mr Edgar.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Liv comes to blows with some longtime enemies over Halloween. Ella and Kelsey are at the receiving end of some serious aggro.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Diags has organised a glittery joint birthday bash for Pete and Chloe Sims, and everyone is invited. But it looks like not everyone will attend.

25.name: Season 25
25.overview: The Only Way Is Essex is a reality series which follows some people living in Essex, including a club promoter, a would-be model, a member of a girl band and two bar workers. Each episode features action filmed just a few days previously.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Having navigated their way through lockdown, the Essex elite are back, and TOWIE royalty makes a welcome return to the fold. Amy Childs is back.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Pete and Chloe Sims haven't spoken in months. It's a shame, because the former besties always had so much in common, including how stubborn they both are.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Pete and Chloe Sims' relationship is nothing if not tempestuous. Six months ago, they were inseparable, until an argument exposed some serious cracks.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Brockett's claims that Harry's been flirting with her. Elsewhere, Clelia feels hurt after Bobby lashes out at her during an argument on a night out.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Yaz and Lockie have planted themselves firmly in the honeymoon period. It's a new look, and it suits them. No labels, no stress. Surely nothing's gonna rain on their parade.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Bobby and Matt are going from strength to strength; they've moved in together and are more loved up than ever before. But Bobby's biological clock is ticking, and he's feeling broody.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Pete and Chloe Sims dropped a major bombshell in a therapy session when they admitted that when it came to their friendship, the lines had been blurred.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Since bumping into each other on a night out, Kelsey and Chloe Brockett have been wondering whether it might be time to lay their beef to rest.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Nicole and Amber have had two rows in the space of a week, and it doesn't look like the mutual hatred is waning. But an already awkward situation for their mate just got worse.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: After some time away, Pete is back in Essex, and who's he checking in on first? Miss Chloe Sims, of course. It turns out the trip away has given him some time to reflect.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Things have been moving quickly for Bobby and Matt. After spending every day of lockdown together in perfect harmony, Matt made the move to Essex, permanently.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Having just celebrated their first anniversary, things are looking rosy when it comes to Harry and Frankie's romance. But scratch the surface, and all is not what it seems.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Halloween celebrations hit Essex with some hair-raising revelations and a bit of bad blood. Harry and Frankie address their relationship issues in an emotional chat.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Dan Edgar's bachelor pad is closing its doors and being relaunched, so Dan invites the lads over to say goodbye. Will the boys be able to hold it together during a final farewell?

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Chloe Sims and Diags have made plans for a vintage knees-up, but with Covid restrictions in play, they split the guest list down the middle and throw two rival gatherings.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The Essex elite are back with a bang. The Sims sisters have a heart-to-heart with youngest sister Demi about her new relationship. Meanwhile, Diags targets a world record attempt.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ella spills the beans on her secret kiss with Pete, but how will he respond? Amy finds herself in the middle of not one, but two dramas involving Harry and Saff.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Amy's attempts to mediate between Harry and Bobby end in a row. Ella hopes her friendship with Kelsey isn't beyond repair, and there's a double date for two fledgling romances.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Things are moving fast in Demi's relationship with Francesca. Chloe M and Courtney's attempt to bring their fractured friendship groups together doesn't go to plan.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Chloe Sims has her hands full launching a business and searching for a new home. Plus, there's a new man on the scene to compete with Pete for Ella's affection.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lockie is back, to best pal Pete's delight. And what better way to return to the fold than with a camping trip. Meanwhile, Gatsby wants to take things to the next step with Dani.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Chloe Sims' confidence gets in the way of her becoming Essex's next top business magnate. Meanwhile, best mates Tom and Harry decide to buy a house together.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Tommy and Georgia finally move into their dream home and set their sights on hosting Georgia's baby shower. Clelia ends things with Rem, and Diags aims to set a world record.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Saff wants to return to her carefree self after weeks of drama and extends an olive branch to Amy. Gatsby whisks Dani off on a fun trip to Norfolk, with all of his mates in tow.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Gatsby finds out about Courtney's allegation that he was texting girls behind Dani's back. Meanwhile, Pete and Lockie make plans to move in together.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Chloe Sims looks to find closure with Pete, and Dan gives Gatsby a lesson in anger management. Meanwhile, Ella and Kelsey make some progress in rebuilding their friendship.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The gang returns with a bang and no shortage of glam, gossip or drama. Chloe B and Lockie are the talk of the town when news of their secret tryst spreads.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Lockie is in a pickle and Chloe Brockett wants answers. A singles night introduces the boys and girls to some new faces and a familiar face returns when Yaz reunites with her pals.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Demi offers Dan and Amber an olive branch in the form of a birthday invite, but will Chloe Sims be able to be in the same room as them? Meanwhile, Gatsby has a big question for Dani, Saff puts her agony aunt skills to good use on her new radio show, and entrepreneur Chloe Brockett is ready to take the fashion world by storm.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Demi decides it is time for some soul searching with the help of her sisters. Dan and Amber enter a new phase of their relationship when they welcome a puppy into their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Dani and Gatsby are finally official and all loved up, while the 'Dogfather' is putting his business plans into full swing as he breaks the news of his new venture to his pals.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: It's Breast Cancer Awareness month, and with the subject close to Saff's heart she is encouraging her friends to get their tops off in the name of charity. Just when everyone thought the Great Gatsby and Chloe Brockett feud was over, new rumours have surfaced regarding romantic history between the pair.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Dan and Amber throw a huge Halloween bash. Meanwhile, Brockett struggles to put her past differences with Frankie behind her.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The gang are going out with a bang as Chloe Sims, TOWIE's Queen of Essex, is turning 40, and Chloe is throwing a birthday gala to celebrate.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Diags and Elma finally admit how much they like each other. Meanwhile, Jordan and new girlfriend Sophie come face to face with his ex Chloe.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Chloe Brockett questions the loyalty of her friends after she storms out of Dan and Amber's housewarming party. A drunken kiss leaves Roman and Dani as confused as ever.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Harry wants to go all out and plan the most perfect day for Amy's baby shower, and Chloe, Courtney and Amber talk to Jordan after his fiery exchange with Chloe B.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Amber thinks that Brockett is being a hypocrite after making up with their enemy Junaid, and could Dani and Roman's fledgling relationship be over already?

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Roman looks for advice after finding himself in a love triangle, and Junaid falls out with Dani and Ella. Is it too late to save their friendship?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After Junaid tried to kiss Harry on a night out, they come face to face to talk it out for the first time - will Junaid admit his feelings towards Harry?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As Thailand draws to a close, Dani is on the war path and confronts Roman at Jordan's birthday party about the lies. Back in Essex, a devastated Roman tries to win Dani back.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Things are finally looking up for loved-up Roman in his mission to get Dani back, and he continues his grand gestures of love by hiring out Dani's favourite restaurant for a date.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Tensions between Amber and Chloe B reach an all-time high. Later, Amber is furious when she finds out Chloe has been discussing the drama with her enemies.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After a series of ups and downs, Roman and Dani finally seem on track to being loved-up. Harry, on the other hand, is having second thoughts after seeing some red flags with Junaid and is worried he is leading him on.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The Essex squad head for beautiful Cyprus - Dan and Amber have called time on their relationship, but will Dan be able to enjoy his newly single status on holiday?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A girl band who have recently split up are in the hotel restaurant throwing shade and preparing for a war of words, but they don't know that Amber is waiting in the wings.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Amber and Dan come face to face at the White Party - with all their friends watching and listening on, both shed tears and lay everything out on the table.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Brockett feels she's been mugged off by Elma who should have had her back against Girlband, not befriended them. Elma is left angry and upset by Brockett's reaction.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: With harsh words having been exchanged on both sides, Elma and Brockett have taken their relationship to the brink of destruction. Can they make amends?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Harry feels at a loss with how to move forward from his fall out with Junaid. When Junaid reaches out with an olive branch text, will the former besties be able to call a truce?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Amber is back in town and needs to be brought up to date on all the gossip by her Girlband bandmates, Chloe M and Courtney. What will she make of all the goings on in her absence?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Things get complicated when Diags invites his new beau, Jodie, on the group's mini break. How will Elma react when she comes face-to-face with the girl who has stolen Diags' heart?

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Roman drops a truth bomb on Dani that he still has feelings for her! Dani knows she must tell Brockett what Roman said, but how will Brockett react to history repeating itself?

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After Diags introduced his new 'friend', Jodie, to the group, it looked like his and Elma's 'situationship' was at an end. However, the pair can't resist each other...

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: It's the TOWIE finale! It wouldn't be an Essex finale without a classic end of summer Sunset Party and plenty of drama to go with it...

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Our favourite Essex crew are back together in sunny Bali. For the first time in years, everyone on the trip is getting along, but drama is never far away.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Dan and Ella get to know each other better at one of Bali's stunning beach clubs, and home is on Diags' mind as he brings Jodie to Bali to a mixed response.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: With the gang heading back to Essex, Dan doesn't want the party to end and set up a group chat inviting his gang on a big night out to keep the Bali flame alight.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Amber's return from Dubai for good - for now, at least - comes as a shock to Dan, and Jordan and Sophie throw a cowboy-themed party to celebrate Jordan's birthday.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: It's time for double dates as Ella, Dan, Diags and Jodie go out together for the night, but Chloe makes a comment at Jordan's party to Dan that royals the group up.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Dan decides to take Ella camping for their first solo date. Meanwhile, Jordan gets booked in for a sperm count test and Diags joins him for his first consultation.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Dan and Ella's romantic date continues as they end their night stargazing. Meanwhile, Jodie is starting to have doubts about her relationship with Diags.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: There's trouble in Essex as Dani spills the beans to Ella about Dan and Amber's phone call. Will hearing that he's still chatting to Amber throw Ella off?

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The whole Essex crew get together to celebrate Harry's 30th birthday. Meanwhile, Diags has come to some decisions about Jodie and talk to the lads about it.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Our favourite Essex crew have all headed to Cyprus for some summer sun, but tempers fray and passions boil over with the gang all back together.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Amy confronts Joe about his treatment of Harry as the group continue their break in Cyprus, and Elmer and Jodie strengthen their bond after confronting Diags.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: An emotional conversation leaves both Joe and Harry determined to make their relationship work, but a conversation between Joe and Junaid could wreck things yet.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Everyone heads to the beach club to celebrate the last day in Cyprus, but Harry is in no mood to celebrate after learning about Junaid's feelings for Joe.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Emotions run high after Harry and Joe call time on their relationship, and Jodie makes it clear that Diags needs to spend more time bonding with her son Bear.
